Rich Girls Shopping

Brief:

Hop into the world of glitz and glamour with "Rich Girls Shopping," the ultimate shopping spree game that sails you through the most opulent cities across the globe! From the romance-laden streets of Paris to the trendsetting alleys of New York, prepare to embark on an extravagant journey accompanied by the flash of credit cards and the rustle of high-end fashion labels. Grab your virtual besties, because Rich Girls Shopping is not merely a game â€“ it's a lifestyle!
